snippet: The World Trade Organization affirmed that Boeing received $5 billion in improper subsidies, giving it an unfair advantage over Airbus, but both sides were claiming victory in the decision.
abstract: World Trade Organization affirms that Boeing received $5 billion in improper subsidies from the United States government, giving it an unfair advantage over Airbus, but both the US and WTO claim victory in the decision.

byline.original: By CHRISTOPHER DREW and NICOLA CLARK

lead_paragraph: The World Trade Organization affirmed that Boeing received $5 billion in improper subsidies, giving it an unfair advantage over Airbus, but both sides were claiming victory in the decision.

headline.seo: W.T.O. Upholds Ruling on Boeing Subsidies
headline.main: In Appeal, W.T.O. Upholds a Decision Against Boeing
headline.print_headline: In Appeal, W.T.O. Upholds A Decision Against Boeing
